digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this product.

identifier._instruction: Enter the identifier for this product, excluding its RRID (e.g., a catalog number).

productName._instruction: Enter the name of this product as stated by the 'provider'.

provider._instruction: Add the party (private, commercial or industrial) that provided this product.

purity._instruction: Enter the purity of the product as stated by the 'provider'.
